sect1.title: Acknowledgements
sect1.para: The NGLayout engine (Gecko) is developed under the Mozilla project.

sect1.title: About this document
sect1.para: This document was written in SGML using DocBook, and then rendered with jade and the cygnus-both style sheet.

The following people have contributed in creating the K-Meleon manual:
Ulf Erikson
Joshua Holman
Andrew I. Mutch
Brooks Moses
pobelly
Michael Sachner
Zarneth
